meanings.definition: The revival of something that has been dormant or inactive.
meanings.sent1: The renascences of the old traditions brought new life to the village.
meanings.sent2: During the renascences of interest in history, many ancient artifacts were discovered.
meanings.sent3: The renascences of the old stories made the children eager to hear more.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for gardening experienced a renascences after visiting the botanical garden.
meanings.sent5: The renascences of the music festival made it a must-attend event.

meanings.definition: A period of renewed interest in art, literature, or learning.
meanings.sent1: The renascences of creativity in the town led to a flourishing art scene.
meanings.sent2: The library saw a renascences of visitors after the new book collection was introduced.
meanings.sent3: The renascences of poetry readings at the cafe always drew a large crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her classroom became a renascences of learning with the introduction of interactive activities.
meanings.sent5: The renascences of interest in science sparked new experiments and discoveries.
